prompt: Create a product comparison page with a retro theme, featuring a cream background and a brown header with 'Compare Products' in a retro font (Courier New) and a back arrow icon. Display three product cards in a horizontal scroll, each with a rounded square image placeholder (160px), product name in bold brown, price in red, a star rating with gold stars, and a list of four specifications in black. Include a teal 'Add to Cart' button at the top-right of each card. Use cards with 10px border radius, a subtle embossed effect, and 16px spacing. Emphasize a nostalgic design with bold colors and a structured layout.
